briefdescription.para: It checks if a file exist and that its size is 'correct'.

detaileddescription.para:
fn
The ckpt. file name to check.
fs
The ckpt. file size to check.
checksum
The file checksum to check.
integer 0 if file exists, 1 if not or wrong size.
This function checks whether a file exist or not and if its size is the expected one.

briefdescription.para: It detects all the erasures for a particular level.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Conf
Configuration metadata.
FTI_Exec
Execution metadata.
FTI_Topo
Topology metadata.
FTI_Ckpt
Checkpoint metadata.
erased
The array of erasures to fill.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function detects all the erasures for L1, L2 and L3. It return the results in the erased array. The search for erasures is done at the three levels independently on the current recovery level.

briefdescription.para: It decides wich action take depending on the restart level.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Conf
Configuration metadata.
FTI_Exec
Execution metadata.
FTI_Topo
Topology metadata.
FTI_Ckpt
Checkpoint metadata.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function launches the required action depending on the recovery level. The recovery level is detected from the checkpoint ID of the last checkpoint taken.
